name: zuse
description: Digital physics framework for building virtual worlds

scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn workspaces foreach -A run build
scripts.clean: concurrently "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/registry run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-simulator run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-world run clean"
scripts.dev: yarn run clean && yarn run dev-no-clean
scripts.registry: concurrently -n registry -c red "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/registry run build && yarn workspace @tenetxyz/registry run deploy"
scripts.base:sim: concurrently -n base-simulator -c magenta "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-simulator run initialize"
scripts.base:world: concurrently -n base-world -c cyan "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-world run initialize"
scripts.dev-no-clean: concurrently -n framework -c white "yarn run registry && yarn run base:sim && yarn run base:world"
scripts.mud:up: yarn workspaces foreach -t run yarn mud set-version -v canary && yarn install
